metadata.Title: CVE-2022-20502 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: In GetResolvedMethod of entrypoint_utils-inl.h, there is a possible useafter free due to a stale cache. This could lead to local informationdisclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interactionis not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-13AndroidID: A-222166527

criterions.comment: android-platform-art: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
